tasks.instruction:
Research and gather accurate information about Ministry of Coffee from the following sources:
- Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/MinisterstwoKawy
- Google Maps: https://maps.app.goo.gl/k2hiC917oE1z4ynR8

Extract and compile:
1. All images posted on their Facebook page (download and save them)
2. Menu items, prices, and descriptions if available
3. Opening hours
4. Any additional information about the cafe (history, specialties, events)
5. Verify the address: Marszałkowska 27/35, 00-639 Warszawa
6. Verify the phone number: +48 780 788 154
7. Get the exact coordinates for the map location

Save all gathered information in a structured format (JSON or markdown) at /workspace/ministry_coffee_data.json and save all downloaded images to /workspace/images/ folder.

Ensure 100% accuracy - double check all information gathered.
